pageItems.label: Supervisor Override:
pageItems.description: Specify the approving supervisor (should be in the organizational chain of recipient, or Manager-NERC/CIP Compliance, or Director-Enterprise Security and Compliance, or CIP Senior Manager-CIO).

pageItems.label: Supervisor:
pageItems.description: Specify the approving supervisor (should be in the organizational chain of recipient, or Manager-NERC/CIP Compliance, or Director-Enterprise Security and Compliance, or CIP Senior Manager-CIO).

pageItems.label: Which domain is this request for?

pageItems.description:
Reminder to supervisor: any required revocation requests are being submitted on your behalf and it is your responsibility to ensure access has ended (exit from PSPs, logout from cyber systems) prior to the requested revocation date/time (default 3:00pm last day in service/role).

Enter the date and time access is no longer needed below. Access rights will be revoked at or shortly after the specified time in order to ensure compliance with regulatory standard requirements.

**If submitting a request for a date/time already passed, submit this request with the current date and time and immediately contact the Manager, NERC/CIP Compliance at 920-433-1426 (desk) or 262-875-8390 (cell).  Escalate to the Director Enterprise Security & Compliance at 262-544-7517 if needed.

Note: If employee or contractor has been granted more than one type of NERC CIP access rights (physical, operator login, admin login, shared admin account, CIP information) a separate removal request must be submitted for each type of rights. Contact the CIP-Compliance-Team (Group Mbox) for clarification or assistance and escalate to the Manager, NERC/CIP Compliance if necessary.

options.displayValue: Transfer/Reassignment (Examples:  Job Transfer, Project Completion, Extended Leave of Absence, Access no longer required, etc.)

pageItems.label: Comments:
pageItems.description: If ‘Name Not Found’ is selected, include the following information, if known:  recipient’s name, corporate ID, company, department, and phone number
